text: Repas de bébé is a 1895 French silent movie directed by Louis LumièreMichael Temple, Michael Witt. The French Cinema BookBaby’s Meal and stars Andrée Lumière, Auguste Lumière, and Marguerite Lumière. ==Actors== * Andrée Lumière as Herself, 'Bébé' (Born in 1894). * Auguste Lumière as Himself * Marguerite Lumière as Herself ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:French movies Category:1895 movies Category:French silent movies
title: Repas de bébé
